channel.title: govc on SoByte
channel.description: Recent content in govc on SoByte

item.title: Govc User Guide
item.description: I recently needed to do some parameter configuration, virtual switch/net creation, virtual machine creation, VIB installation, PCI direct access, virtual machine creation, etc. on ESXi host for work reasons. So I took the time to sort out some of the pitfalls I encountered while using govc. govc govc is a wrapper implementation of the official VMware govmomi library. It can be used to perform a number of operations on ESXi
